sqlMap.insert: insert into ITEMS (NO, TITLE, CONTENT, TRADE_CATEGORY, ITEM_CONDITION, PRICE, USER_NO, LOCATION, EMAIL, SHIPPING_FEE, VIEW_COUNT, REG_DATE, ADDRESS, USER_NAME, SELL_STATE) VALUES(seq_items.nextval, #title#, #content#, #tradeCategory#, #itemCondition#, #price#, #userNo#, #location#, #email#, #shippingFee#, 0, sysdate, #address#, #userName#, '판매중')
sqlMap.select: select no,title, to_char(price,'9,999,999,999,999') as price, location,to_char(reg_date,'MM"월 "DD"일 "HH24"시"') as regDate from items
select no_item_pic, item_no, image from item_pic
select * from item_pic where item_no=#itemNo#

select no,title, to_char(price,'9,999,999,999,999') as price, location,to_char(reg_date,'MM"월 "DD"일 "HH24"시"') as regDate from items where #maxlat# >= substr(location,0, instr(location, ',')-1) and substr(location,0, instr(location, ',')-1) >= #minlat# and #maxlng# >= substr(location, instr(location, ',')+1, length(location)-instr(location, ',')) and substr(location, instr(location, ',')+1, length(location)-instr(location, ',')) >= #minlng# order by no desc

select no,title, to_char(price,'9,999,999,999,999') as price, location,to_char(reg_date,'MM"월 "DD"일 "HH24"시"') as regDate from items where title like '%'||#kwd#||'%' or content like '%'||#kwd#||'%' order by no desc
select * from hash_tag where UPPER(tag_name)=#kwd# or lower(tag_name)=#kwd#
select no_item_pic, item_no, image from item_pic where item_no=#no#
select count(*) from items
select Max(no) from items where email=#email# and title=#title#

select * from items where user_no=#userNo#
select * from hash_tag
select * from hash_tag where item_no=#itemNo# and tag_name=#tagName#

sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO ANALYSIS_KEYWORD a USING DUAL ON ( a.AGE_GROUP = #age_group# AND a.GENDER = #gender# AND a.KEYWORD = #kwd#) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN insert (AGE_GROUP, GENDER, KEYWORD) VALUES (#age_group#, #gender#, #kwd#)

sqlMap.update: UPDATE ITEMS SET SELL_STATE = #sellState# WHERE no = #itemNo#

UPDATE ITEMS SET TITLE=#title#, CONTENT=#content#, TRADE_CATEGORY=#tradeCategory#, ITEM_CONDITION=#itemCondition#, PRICE=#price#, LOCATION=#location#, EMAIL=#email#, SHIPPING_FEE=#shippingFee#, ADDRESS=#address# WHERE NO=#itemNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_PIC (NO_ITEM_PIC, ITEM_NO, IMAGE) VALUES( seq_item_pic.nextval, #NO#, #IMAGE#)
sqlMap.update: update ITEMS SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 where no=#no#
sqlMap.select: select TITLE , NO, VIEW_COUNT from (select title, no, view_count from ITEMS i order by i.VIEW_COUNT desc) a where ROWNUM < 11

SELECT z1.IMAGE , i.NO, i.title, i.location, i.price, i.REG_DATE, i.SELL_STATE, i.VIEW_COUNT FROM (SELECT p1.image image, p1.ITEM_NO itemNo FROM item_pic p1, ( SELECT min (NO_ITEM_PIC) as NO_ITEM_PIC FROM item_pic GROUP BY item_no) p2 WHERE p1.NO_ITEM_PIC = p2.NO_ITEM_PIC) z1 , items i WHERE i.no = z1.itemNo and i.USER_NO = #no#
sqlMap.update: update ITEMS SET reg_date = sysdate where no=#no#
